channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
i get this error when i compile my client
[code]Class5.java:19: illegal start of type else if(i == 10991) { // NPC ID, can be changed. ^ Class5.java:354: <identifier> expected private static int anInt56; ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
thanks guys..

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

so like this ?

if(i == 10991) { // NPC ID, can be changed.

i did that and i got this error.

[code]Class5.java:19: illegal start of type
if(i == 10991) { // NPC ID, can be changed.
^
Class5.java:354: expected
private static int anInt56;
^
2 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

don’t use else if, just if.

Read full topic
